name: Le Rembobineur
description:
This game was made in a week, for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 which theme was 'Rewind'.

The main character, Le Rembobineur, automatically follow a path to a cassette palced at the end of each level. You have to interact with elements, such as door of the levels to help him. By doing this, you will prevent guards from stopping Le Rembobineur. You have control over time, and can stop or even rewind every actions whenever you want.

Have fun!
